DEATHBED.Definition: the bed that someone dies in or is dying in

DIAMONDS.Definition: a transparent, extremely hard precious stone that is used in jewelry, and in industry for cutting hard things

GOLD.Definition: a chemical element that is a valuable, shiny, yellow metal used to make coins and jewelry

ELEGANT.Definition: graceful and attractive in appearance or behavior

WALK AWAY.Definition: to stop being involved in a situation because it is difficult to deal with or does not give you any advantages

PROUD.Definition: feeling pleasure and satisfaction because you or people connected with you have done or gotten something good

NEIGHBORING.Definition: Neighboring places are next to or near each other

KINGDOMS.Definition: a country ruled by a king or queen

CALLED ON.Definition: to ask someone in a formal way to do something

TIMES OF NEED.Definition: when help is needed : in times when one does not have the things one needs

ACCOMPANY.Definition: to go with someone or to be provided or exist at the same time as something

ARRANGE.Definition: to plan, prepare for, or organize something

FUNERAL.Definition: a (usually religious) ceremony for burying or burning the body of a dead person

TOOK CARE OF.Definition: past tense of ‘take care of’: to protect someone or something and provide the things that that person or thing needs

MORAL.Definition: The moral of a story, event, or experience is the message that you understand from it about how you should or should not behave

DECORATE.Definition: to add something to an object or place, especially in order to make it more attractive

JEWELRY.Definition: decorative objects worn on your clothes or body that are usually made from valuable metals, such as gold and silver, and precious stones

POSESSESSIONS.Definition: something that you own or that you are carrying with you at a particular time

SEND US OFF.Definition: Send (sb) off: to express good wishes and say goodbye to someone who is leaving a place

NEGLECT.Definition: to not give enough care or attention to people or things that are your responsibility

CHERISH.Definition: to love, protect, and care for someone or something that is important to you

PRAY.Definition: to speak to a god either privately or in a religious ceremony in order to express love, admiration, or thanks or in order to ask for something

MEDITATE.Definition: to think calm thoughts in order to relax or as a religious activity

FAITHFUL.Definition: firm and not changing in your friendship with or support for a person or an organization, or in your belief in your principles

FAIRY TALES.Definition: a traditional story written for children that usually involves imaginary creatures and magic

FICTION.Definition: the type of book or story that is written about imaginary characters and events and not based on real people and facts
